topic.fullpath: Topic :: Communications :: Chat :: Internet Relay Chat

name: NXscript - XChat companion
short_description:
NXscript is a collection of scripts in Python for the popular IRC client on
Linux, XChat.
The scripts offers some features not found in XChat by default. These features
are to make communicating with your friends on IRC easier and more comfortable.
